channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Older Workers Can Now Supersize Their 401(k) Savings
item.description: The new super catch-up rule is part of the inflation adjustments to retirement account limits announced Friday.

item.title: Cinemark at ‘inflection point,’ well-placed for postpandemic recovery, Benchmark says
item.description: Cinemark Holdings Inc.’s better-than-expected third-quarter results this week bode well for the movie-theater chain amid a broader industry rebound, a...

item.title: You Bought Blockbuster I Bonds. Here's What to Do With Them Now.
item.description: The millions of people who bought I bonds when inflation peaked have a decision to make: Hold them, or redeem them and buy new ones.

item.title: Oil prices lifted by report Iran may be planning another major strike on Israel
item.description: Oil futures finished higher on Friday, finding support after a news report that Iran may be planning another major strike on Israel.

item.title: Don’t let the stock’s selloff fool you. Nvidia had a great week.
item.description: Big cloud companies aren’t backing down from their AI spending, which bodes well for Nvidia.

item.title: This closely watched stock-market indicator hit a 2.5-year high. What it says will happen next.
item.description: Wall Street was growing more bullish in the final weeks before the Nov. 5 presidential election — a contrarian sign that may suggest limited upside fo...

item.title: The Trump Betting Whale Speaks Out: 'I Have Absolutely No Political Agenda'
item.description: A self-described French trader says he bet more than $30 million on the U.S. election after analyzing polls.

item.title: This surprising investment strategy could boost your retirement nest egg—but proceed with caution
item.description: Most people want to play it safe with their retirement nest egg — but they could also lose ground that way.

item.title: Gold Falls Late in Trading
item.description: Front-month gold futures finished the day down 0.1% as the precious metal lost momentum throughout the day.

item.title: Dow, Nasdaq Rally After Tech Selloff
